EmailTemplate.name: MBO Partners Information (1355848708.0)
EmailTemplate.subject: MBO Partners Information (1355848708.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
- - - Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE Hi Kevin, It was a pleasure speaking with you today. I’ve enclosed a few resources as discussed before we speak later this week - Here is a short list of some of our top clients within MBO Access <http://info.mbopartners.com/rs/mbo/images/MBO_Access_Information.pdf>.
- In addition we have a index of recorded Webinars that will cover everything to do with working independently. You can see them by going here <http://www.mbopartners.com/resources>.
- Lastly, you can view all the information we spoke over the phone by going here <http://info.mbopartners.com/advisor-info-n-taylor.html>. Please schedule a convenient time for us to follow upusing my online schedule <https://my.timedriver.com/9TGRK>. I look forward to speaking with you! Have a great day, Nicolette___________________________________Nicolette TaylorConsultant Services AdvisorMBO Partners t: 703.793.6281f: 703.793.6456e: ntaylor@mbopartners.com <bbentley@mbopartners.com>w: www.mbopartners.com <http://www.mbopartners.com/> Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com <mailto:postmaster@mbopartners.com> and permanently delete the e-mail and files.
